items.sentence: I\'m the only one still in contact with Tom.
I\'m the only one who survived the accident.
I\'m the only person Tom knows in this town.
I\'m the only person who knows where Tom is.
I\'m thinking of going to Boston next month.
I\'m trying not to do anything to upset Tom.
I finally found the solution to the problem.
I found this book in a secondhand bookstore.
I knew you wouldn\'t like the way Tom cooks.
Tom loved Mary, who didn\'t love him at all.
Tom did everything the way Mary told him to.
Tom did it in spite of all the difficulties.
Tom did it out of the goodness of his heart.
Tom and I don\'t plan on traveling together.
Tom didn\'t know Mary had already done that.
Tom didn\'t know how to tell Mary the truth.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was already dead.
Tom didn\'t know that the bridge was closed.
Tom didn\'t mind helping Mary do the dishes.
I\'d highly recommend doing that right away.
